description: Looking for the peace of mind that I need to do what I love, meditation helps me to improve my decision making, gives me a mental balance, helps me with my emotions and see the world from another perspective. Relaxing music and keep the mind in a state of balance and peace.  The more you give the more you receive is a way to generate abundance. Your donation of 5 dollars will help me continue my work and keep this channel open. https://paypal.me/feraury?locale.x=es_XC The more you give the more you receive Infinite thanks for your contribution to this potdcas Only by this means
html_description:
Looking for the peace of mind that I need to do what I love, meditation helps me to improve my decision making, gives me a mental balance, helps me with my emotions and see the world from another perspective.

Relaxing music and keep the mind in a state of balance and peace.



The more you give the more you receive is a way to generate abundance.


Your donation of 5 dollars will help me continue my work and keep this channel open.

name: Relaxing music and keep the mind in a state of balance and peace.

show.description: You can achieve anything you want by changing your mental habits... Today I share some positive actions that will lead us to make great changes in our lives. Let's do some general cleaning to learn to live in a different way.

show.name: Cambia Tu Mente Y Podrás Cambiar Tu Vida
